title: Assessment of satellite-based water requirements for a drip-irrigated apple orchard in Mediterranean agroclimatic conditions
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Daniel de la Fuente-Saiz, Samuel Ortega-Farias, Marcos Carrasco-Benavides, Samuel Ortega-Salazar, Fei Tian, Sufen Wang, Yi Liu
